name: Noah's Apartment
description:
Noah loves animals, but can he fit all of these pets into his apartment and keep them from eating one another?

Controls: It's a game about animals, so use your mouse!

Made with: Godot Engine, FamiTracker, Photoshop.

NOTE: As far as I tried,  the html version runs on Chrome but not Safari. I'd recommend downloading for best experience.

Made in 3 days. Could have qualified for compo, but missed the deadline due to work, so I'm submitting it to the jam.
